definition: victory is in sight

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: Republicans from Pennsylvania and New York are scenting victory.
sentences.chinese: 來自賓夕法尼亞州和紐約州的共和黨人感到勝利在望。

sentences.english: Father, we are on the cusp of victory.
sentences.chinese: 父親，我們已經勝利在望了。
